DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVE - Current treatment benign thyroid oral levothyroxin suppression thyrotropin secretion tumor growth . Although current consensus take thyroxin one hour meal PH value gastrointestinal tract affect drug absorption , patient suffer epigastric discomfort take thyroxin empty stomach , wish take postprandial . However , direct evidence show take thyroxin different time point significantly affect treatment outcome . Besides , response thyroxin therapy differs among people . The purpose study evaluate clinical significance different time point thyroxine intake search factor relate thyroxin response benign thyroid tumor . RESEARCH DESIGN AND METHODS - We include patient benign thyroid tumor diagnose fine needle aspiration cytology normal thyroid function study . After informed consent , patient randomly assign two group . Patients first group take thyroxin one hour breakfast thyrotropin level stabilize 0.5 1.0 mU/L 3 month . Then thyroxin discontinue . Patients restart thyroxin therapy three month later breakfast . Patients another group take thyroxin postprandial , discontinue thyroxin one hour breakfast . Questionnaire interview diet life style , blood sample fine needle aspiration cytology sample obtain . Changes thyroid nodule evaluate thyroid echo . STATISTIC ANALYSIS - Descriptive data describe mean SDs continuous variable , analysis variance Chi-square test use assess significance . A p-value 0.05 consider significant . Keywords : benign thyroid tumor , thyroxin , preprandial , postprandial .
